response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries a unique value that aligns with your potential needs and aspirations. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at an introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing.", "product_price": 950000}
